item.title: Networking Questions
item.description: Base on: Linux System Administrator/DevOps Interview Questions What is localhost and why would ping localhost fail? localhost is a hostname that refers to the current computer used to access it. It is used to access the network services that are running on the host via the loopback network interface. Using the loopback interface bypasses any local network interface hardware. ping localhost fail?: not proper configuration lo interface firewall rules What is the similarity between "ping" & "traceroute" ?
